p:
Glutathione S-transferase (GST, EC 1.5.1.18) activity was assayed with a reaction mixture containing 1-chloro-2,4-dinitrobenzene (CDNB) as substrate, 0.11 M phosphate buffer (pH 6.5), 30 mM CDNB, 0.1 M GSH, distillated water and tissue homogenate (50 µL)
23 . The change in optical density at 340 nm was measured as the activity rate (ε = 9.6 mM −1 cm −1).
